channel.title: [474] Cyberus
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i524.photobucket.com/albums/cc330/Rabrg/Cyberus.jpg[/img]
Cyberus is a 474 (A actual 474) project based off of Hyperion. It will be an economic combat based server, with tons of content and very original so players never get bored.
Sorry for the lack of detail, Ill update this latter.
Application: [left][code]Name: Age: MSN: Languages your capable of programming and how long you've been able to: Previous work:[/code][/left]
If you want to know any more information post here, PM me, or contact me at Chiddix@live.com[/center]
Moderators: Your need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures)
[quote="Aeronity"]Edit: I think I need proof of development so, I just dumped all item names, examine information, equipment bonuses, weights, and prices.
I plan to use weights in the energy restoring/draining system because I feel like energy is important in pking.[/quote]

item.title: [474] Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“Aeronity, post:9, topic:369644”][quote author=Acrodox link=topic=465770.msg3406914#msg3406914 date=1290383600]
and if your too busy to make a thread, simply don’t make it…
[/quote]
As I just said… I’m busy working on the server. I post this thread to get more people to help me work on the server. If I got people to help me work on the server, I would have time to update this thread.[/quote]

ight, whatever, just giving your tips to use in the future

Read full topic
